MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L6 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Somerset Place, West Derby Road and surrounding areas. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of difficulty gaining access to our substation, Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:48AM on 21st December 2020
